description:
Nigel Farage has said Sadiq Khan "hates England" after London cabbies were banned from flying England flags during the European Championships in Germany.

The post Nigel Farage Says Sadiq Khan “Hates England” After Black Cab Taxis Are Banned From Flying England Flag During Euros appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Nigel Farage Says Sadiq Khan “Hates England” After Black Cab Taxis Are Banned From Flying England Flag During Euros

description:
More bosses are pulling the handbrake on costly diversity initiatives after realising they have allowed toxic identity politics to enter their workplace and wasted millions of pounds on pointless schemes.

The post Why Even ‘Woke’ Companies are Turning Their Backs on Toxic HR Diversity Schemes appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Even ‘Woke’ Companies are Turning Their Backs on Toxic HR Diversity Schemes

description:
During the Sacred Month of June, rainbows flutter in high streets like the banners of a sinister occupying force. Or is it a religious cult? Steven Tucker looks at the disturbing history of Gnostic castration movements.

The post Sects and Violence: Transgenderism as a Gnostic Castration Cult appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Sects and Violence: Transgenderism as a Gnostic Castration Cult
